text:
ApOq varu#Nasyaq patna#ya Asaqn tA aqgniraqBya#ddhyAyaqt tAH sama#Bavaqt tasyaq rEtaqH parA#&pataqt tadiqyama#Bavaqdyad dviqtIya#M paqrA&pa#taqt tadaqsAva#BavadiqyaM ~Mvai viqrADaqsau svaqrAD yad-viqrAjA#vupaqdadhA#tIqmE EqvOpa# dhattEq yadvA aqsau rEta#H siq~jcatiq tadaqsyAM prati# tiShThatiq tat 
pra jA#yatEq tA OSha#dhayO - [  ] 18
